DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety influenza ( flu ) vaccine Korean men woman age 65 year old .
DOC.brief_title: A Post-marketing Study Monitor Safety MF59-adjuvanted Influenza Vaccine Administered Korean Subjects Aged 65 Years Older
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female age 65 year day enrollment , eligible seasonal influenza vaccination . 2 . In judgement study doctor determine reasonable health consider age able comply study procedure . 1 . History serious reaction flu vaccine , material vaccine , egg ( include ovalbumin ) chicken protein . 2 . Receipt another ( inactivate ) vaccine within 2 week , receipt live vaccine within 4 week prior Study Day 1 , plan receive vaccination final study visit ( Day 29 vaccination ) . 3 . Any condition , opinion study doctor , might interfere evaluation study objective .
